memberdef.name: TABVECLOGICOPER
memberdef.initializer: template<class T> inline \ Bool aips_name2(all,NAME) (const TableVector<T>& l, \ const TableVector<T>& r) \ { return aips_name2(tabVecReptv,NAME) (l.tabVec(), r.tabVec()); } \ template<class T> inline \ Bool aips_name2(all,NAME) (const T& val, const TableVector<T>& tv) \ { return aips_name2(tabVecRepvall,NAME) (val, tv.tabVec()); } \ template<class T> inline \ Bool aips_name2(all,NAME) (const TableVector<T>& tv, const T& val) \ { return aips_name2(tabVecRepvalr,NAME) (tv.tabVec(), val); }
